title: ehsanshafin
author: ehsanshafin
content: Greetings Bitcointalk. I hope this message finds you well. I am Alex Buckland, the person tortured for years by the UK/US government, serving a home prison sentence for Habbo hacking.I once stole 40 BTC. With a Remote Administration Tool (trojan) it's my biggest heist but I believe they were planted there by Obama.You see, they've been keeping me poor over the years. I would have had rich people infected on my RAT. I had thousands of bots. I don't know why they let them through to me to be ransomwared.Anyhow, my message for this thread is... hey look! It's a YouTube video of the guy being hacked by the government and he's saying he won't be gay!What does this mean? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YTqt2klvvLw If you can't work out who I am from this YouTube video, then what the hell are you doing with BTC? You are going to lose all your money! FOOLS!

comments.author: PrinceVisser
